version_description:
-Venture trough hundreds of levels spanning 10 environments, begin your journey of bashing junk food haters from start to finish
-Defeat challenging bosses that just wont give up and let you trough!
-NEW BREAKABLE BLOCKS! Conquer your fear of change, and brake some blocks in the field to have a bigger playing space.
-You can never have enough outfits, all our characters now have 5+ outfits each!
-Grab those keys from your fallen enemies and open up the vault, new fighters await!

-Venture trough hundreds of levels spanning 10 environments, begin your journey of bashing junk food haters from start to finish
-Defeat challenging bosses that just wont give up and let you trough!
-NEW BREAKABLE BLOCKS! Conquer your fear of change, and brake some blocks in the field to have a bigger playing space.
-You can never have enough outfits, all our characters now have 5+ outfits each!
-Grab those keys from your fallen enemies and open up the vault, new fighters await!

- MISSIONS! Every 10 hours, there's arrival of new missions to complete.
- WEAPONS! Complete missions, get weapons cards to unlock unique and deadly instruments of force to defeat your enemies!
- WEAPON ATTACKS! Equip weapon in menu, complete combos while playing and charge the powerful attack. When ready, unleash your junk food rage!
- Coming soon: new character, new weapons, new worlds!
